description: Non Material Amendment to approved permission 2933/21: Amend proposal description to:  Internal and external alterations to Upper House to amend internal layout and provide additional residential units.  Demolition of cottages. Erection of a 6 storey building to provide  self-contained residential units with a communal roof garden, landscaping, associated disabled parking / car parking spaces, electric car charging points, waste / refuse storage, children’s play space and amenity space. (summary).
